content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Llagostera 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Llagostera 1.
Corner,  Llagostera. Conceded by Adri.
Attempt saved. Chumbi (Llagostera) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Pitu with a through ball.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Jordi Masó.
Offside, Almería. Fran Vélez tries a through ball, but Quique González is caught offside.
Pitu (Llagostera) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by José Ángel (Almería).
Attempt missed. Benja (Llagostera) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Aimar.
Attempt missed. José Ángel (Almería) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Eldin Hadzic.
Corner,  Llagostera. Conceded by José Ángel.
Substitution, Almería. José Ángel replaces Fernando Soriano.
Foul by Adri (Almería).
José Carlos (Llagostera) wins a free kick on the right wing.
